text: Abdelaziz Mohamed Hegazy (; 3 January 1923 â€“ 22 December 2014) was an egyptian economist, and the former prime minister of Egypt under President Mohamed Anwar El-Sadat from September 25, 1974 to 1975. Hegazy served as Minister of the Treasury 1968 to 1972, and Minister of Finance and Foreign Trade 1973 to 1974. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Birmingham Category:Prime Ministers of Egypt
title: Abdel Aziz Mohamed Hegazy
